ROM.Changelog: * **ROM Changes** * Bump Dot version to v1.2 * Merged December Security patch * More visual bug fixes * QS tiles track color accent. * Added Network Indicator (Settings->Data Usage). * Added Changelog section inside About. * New settings icons. * Re-work on overall app icons. * Some new dope walls. * And many more bug fixes and performace enhancements. * and few more bug fixes * Added framework boost. * minor glitch fixes with qs panel. (systemui FC on qs panel is still WIP) * fixed invisible gear icon in settings top bar. * Fix OTA App force close. * Replace CarrierText from Keyguard. * Add missing tiles icon * Track Navbar accent in white theme * Changes in Dailer theme overlay * **Device Specific Changes** * Kernel upstream to 3.18.90 * Re-work on kernel for battery Optimisation * Permformance Optimisation!
